trans-unit.source: Represents a read-only collection of client script blocks that are contained within a Web Form or user control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção somente leitura de blocos de script de cliente que estão contidos dentro de um formulário da Web ou controle de usuário em tempo de design.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> class represents a `script` block that is contained in a document (a Web Form, Web server control, a content page, or a master page) at design time.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem> objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> classe representa um `script` bloco contido em um documento (um formulário da Web, Web controle de servidor, uma página de conteúdo ou uma página mestra) em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> class to set or examine client script elements that are contained in a Web Forms document on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> classe para definir ou examinar os elementos de script de cliente que estão contidos em um documento de formulários da Web na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the collection of client script elements that are contained within the Web document by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Recuperar a coleção de elementos de script de cliente que estão contidos dentro do documento da Web usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Add a client script element to the Web document by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um elemento de script de cliente para o documento da Web usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To add client script elements at run time, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar elementos de script de cliente em tempo de execução, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> class represents script elements at design time that execute on the client.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> classe representa os elementos de script em tempo de design que executam no cliente.

trans-unit.source: Because the `script` elements that are generated for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> objects are not run on the server, the elements do not contain the `runat="server"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Porque o `script` elementos que são gerados para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> objetos não são executados no servidor, os elementos não contêm o `runat="server"` atributo.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem" /> elements used to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de elementos <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem" /> usados para inicializar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: If `clientScriptItems` is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) or does not contain any elements, the constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Se `clientScriptItems` é `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) ou não contém quaisquer elementos, inicializa o construtor um vazio <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the items in the `clientScriptItems` array are used to set the items for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os itens a `clientScriptItems` matriz são usadas para definir os itens para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is typically used in classes that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection.%23ctor%2A> construtor é usado normalmente em classes que derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: Visual designers implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> object for the client script elements in a Web document at design time.
trans-unit.target: Designers visuais implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> método para retornar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItemCollection> objeto para os elementos de script de cliente em um documento da Web em tempo de design.
